value.title: How to create custom color themes - Power BI Tips & Tricks #34
value.excerpt: Do you want to create custom color themes in power bi? Power BI just announced a preview of report themes, which will allow you to quickly color your entire report to match a theme or corporate branding. When you import a theme, all your charts will automatically update to use the theme colors, and you’ll
